ValidationRule.description:
Only records with a Status of 'Draft', 'Submitted', or 'KYC Submitted' can be updated.
https://gulfsothebysinternational.lightning.force.com/lightning/setup/ObjectManager/01I3X000001LTT5/ValidationRules/03d7T000000Xb3y/view
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF( ISCHANGED(Status__c), AND( NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Draft'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Complaince Review')
) ), $User.ProfileId = '00e1t000000HkGa' || $User.ProfileId = '00e3X000001RysS' || $User.ProfileId = '00e7T000001A6dg' ), null )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Status allowed to update either 'Draft' , 'Submitted' Or "Complaince Review" DP AGENT(00e3X000001RysS) & PB Agent(00e1t000000HkGa) & UK Agent (00e7T000001A6dg) .
